lead_paragraph: In the wake of an escort's allegations, Louisville said it would reduce men’s basketball scholarships for the 2017-19 seasons and restrict recruiting opportunities.

headline.print_headline: Louisville Announces More Sanctions for Men's Basketball
headline.main: Louisville Announces More Sanctions for Basketball Team

snippet: In the wake of an escort's allegations, Louisville said it would reduce men’s basketball scholarships for the 2017-19 seasons and restrict recruiting opportunities....
